personal_info.about: A skilled software engineer with 3+ years of hands-on experience in C#, .NET, ASP.NET, and MVC development, complemented by solid proficiency in SQL Server. Specializes in designing, developing, and deploying robust applications leveraging these technologies. Expertise includes creating responsive, intuitive user interfaces with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Proficient in Visual Studio, adept at Agile environments, and utilizes tools like Jira for enhanced project efficiency. Committed to ongoing professional growth, keeps pace with emerging trends and advancements in the industry.

experience.title: Associate Software Engineer
experience.about: Infor is a global leader in business cloud software products for companies in industry specific markets. Infor builds complete industry suites in the cloud.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.about: Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society.

education.about: Banasthali Vidyapith, also known as Banasthali University, is a private university located in the Tonk district in the Indian state of Rajasthan.
